title: Living Wood
summaries: Living Wood is a type of block that makes up the trunks and roots of Living Trees. Upon destruction, it will turn into regular Wood. It cannot be crafted, as it cannot exist in the player's inventory, however, it can be placed using a Living Wood Wand, which in turn consumes Wood.

On the <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, it is a crafting station, solely used to craft <linked>Living Wood Wall</linked>. Although other Living Wood items can be looted from Living Trees, they cannot be crafted on the 3DS.
